item.title: 10 Worst Action Scenes In Superhero Movies
item.description: Superhero action scenes can often be the most thrilling part of their respective movies, but these examples represent the worst aspects of theirs.

item.title: James Corden's 10 Best Movies And TV Shows
item.description: James Corden's best movies and TV shows demonstrate his comedic timing and for many, his musical talent.

item.title: 12 Actors Who Seamlessly Go From Comedy To Drama
item.description: Most actors have their comfort zones, so it takes a special talent to deliver outstanding performances in both comedy and drama movies.
